data.actual_result: The space gets removed making it unable to search
data.expected_result: The space that we have put should not be removed after adding an argument
data.short_description: Searching with arguements (from, in etc.) smashes the argument and search key together making it unable to search
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to search box on any channel - Put a keyword then add an argument. (Ex. Write "Dabbit" make a space and then add an argument like in,from) - Observe and see how two of them get fused together making a cool little sandwiche.g. `test in:#general` -> `testin:#general`
